title: Delightful
review: I liked the first but the second one is a lot better.Gru,the minions,the bad guy.Great family entertainment!Don't miss it.

title: SMOKIN
review: Jim Carrey as a bank clerk finds a mask that makes his dreams come true.Cameron Diaz is also good in her debut.Don't miss it.

title: Ants with the voice and the personality of the cast
review: Great voice cast and plot.Excellent not for very small kids

title: The sound of success
review: Andrews shines as the nun Plummer as the captain and the kids do a fine job in this timeless classic with wonderful music.See it again and again because films like this are unrepeatable.

title: 101 adorable dogs
review: And what can I say for the villain.The most famous and recognising villain Cruella De Ville!That's it.I caught myself singing the song.A true classic for the whole family.

title: Great
review: Mulan is one of the best disney princesses.In order to help her father she disguises herself as a boy.Great music,lovable characters,strong story.What more can you ask?

title: Disney with suspence
review: Excellent characters and plot development,that reminds of Disney's Robin hood with the animal characters.Great fun for children and adults.

title: Tale as old as time
review: Beauty and the beast a true classic with humor,suspense and lovable characters a total experience for all ages.

title: I ve seen better
review: The truth is that Dramworks have brought us great films like shrek or Sindbad and the bee movie but this one is the exception.The characters are nothing special has a few moments to laugh,and that's it.See it just once but you'll probably be dissapointed.

title: Good mystery film
review: Especially from Plummer and Craig who give their best teh film goes slow and slow till the end which gives us the guilty person.A nice piece of work better watched it a rainy afternoon,to feel better the suspence.

title: Nemo is great
review: Excellent underwater depiction lovable characters and nice background music.Enjoy!

title: My captain oh captain
review: Robin steals the show as the rebel tacher to a strict college.Ethan Hawk is also good in onee of his first roles.Possibly Weirs best film so far.

title: The bare necessities
review: The last film Disney supervised is one of the best.Killer soundtrack,excellent characters script faithful to Kipling's story.

title: Expected more
review: The new disney princess has nice animation and characters,but the story is somewhat boring.See it just for the collection of the Pixar fims.

title: Rapunzel by Disney
review: The princess,the young rascall and a new adventure is given with the unique way only Disney can provide

title: Adorable
review: A weird but also wise plot.The monsters that use their voices and appearance to scare children and this provides their energy.Wonderful voice cast by the veterans.A must see for the whole family.

title: Williams at his best
review: And Levinson gives us the brightest film in his career.Williams is the radio presenter that gives the energy to the soldiers to fight.Humor,marvelous script and another memorable film to watch with the whle family.Too bad he passed away so soon and he won't give us any more performances.

title: Silly
review: I tried to watch it,but after the first 20 mins became silly.Well voice cats but it's not enough.

title: A MUST SEE
review: Clever lines delivery from all the actos,Zeppo in his final role has something to do,Harpo hilarious as mute comedian especially during the lemonade scene and what a hilarious battle finale.Discover it for yourselves.It flows like water.

title: Become a chef with Ratatouille's help
review: I haven't seen it in theaters and I was very curious.The first time I saw it,I was very excited.Ratatouille is another Pixar's classic with lovable characters,humor and action plus a taste of Paris.

title: Our inside feelings
review: Given by Pixar which once again made the miracle.Nice analyse of the insight world,wonderful scenery and nice background.

title: Very good sequel
review: Although the last film left us with a touching ending and I didn't expect to be followed Pixar made it after 9 years.Woody has the main character and the others have little lines.Forky is the main new toy character.The show steals the motorcycle man.See it with low expectations as the last film of the first great box office that made Pixar famous.

title: Carrey is a clown
review: With grimaces hand gestures and rubber body you have 1,30 hour of fun.One of Carrey's best from the director of pet detective.

title: Paul Newman's swan song
review: Pixar,Disney and some veteran actors made this film a huge success.Races,a life lesson between old and new car and you have another memorable film from Disney-Pixar.

title: Under the sea
review: This song is my personal favorite and it was nominated for an academy award.Now for the movie Benson has a wonderful voice,Ursula is the unforgettable villain and the underwater scenes are very well drawed.A funny film with memorable songs.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Tarantino with a few violence
review: It starts on the ste of the movie.Very good performances from Pitt and Di Caprio and a cameo from the veteran Pacino.The film puts us in the climate of the era,with the cars the bars and the people of spectacle.A little bizarre finale.But all in all a fine film.

title: Trash
review: Don't waste your time.Awful.Watch the cartoon instead.

title: A total disaster
review: What a shame,25 years after the release of the masterpiece comes this crap.Don't even bother to waste your time.

title: Charming
review: Ready to become a superhero?Pixar brings to life a family with superpowers with 4 people try to cooperate.Voice talents by Holly Hunter,Samuel Jackson and Graig Nelson and here's the new jackpot

title: The adventure goes on
review: With a little suspense,adventure and a great sense of humour cars 2 is the one film you ll enjoy with your family.Not to mention Michael Caine and Emily Mortimer as the spies.

title: Wonderful
review: Tom Hulce gave the performance of his life as well as Abraham did.Music scenery,costumes,performances.A must especially for Xmas days.

title: A trip to mexican culture
review: Pixar has given us many successes.Coco is one of the last ones.With a beautiful story,amazing characters,nice music and an unpredictable finale Coco is a film for the whole family.Check it out

title: Boring
review: I liked the animation but the entire plot was very boring.I caught myself looking at my watch severeal times.Pixar has made better films.

title: Shrek vs the relatives
review: With memorable characters,nice plot and the puss in boots voiced by Banderas is must see for Shrek and non Shrek fans.

title: Another special film from PIXAR
review: Came the same year with Antz,but with a total different plot.Grasshopers vs ants and a rebel ant that finds fighters from a circus.Great family entertainment!

title: Pixar's first masterpiece
review: I rememeber I was a schoolboy when i saw it on cinema with my dad.A total new experience made by computer with humour,adnenture and emotion.With stars as Tom Hanks,Tim Allen and Don Rickles toy story is a film experience you'll never forget.

title: Puss goes solo
review: Banderas is very talented and reminds me of a cat Zorro in his very own film.Humor and adventure all together

title: Perfect
review: Toy story was just the begining.Toy story 2 is the improvement and teaches us that when there is fantasy nothing dies.New characters,fun,adventure and a sequel totally fresh

title: Masterpiece
review: Benigni in his best role so far.Braschi very good also and a small boy to Aousvits.Touching moments humor and a film that deserved more than two Oscars.A must see again and again and again.

title: Brilliant
review: Emmotional human drama and a lovable character who wants to get away a s modern inventor.Check for the greek version only to hear for Voutsas and Konstantinou in their one and only greek dubbing.

title: Nice film
review: Nice and vibrant colours,amazing landscapes of Rio and two lovable bird characters.My only disagreement the bird villain I wanted it darker.All in all one hour and a half of innocent fun and great opening and closing sequence of music and dance.

title: Lesser Disney effort
review: I m a huge Disney fan but this time they messed up.Greek mythology combined with the american kitsch.Still the music is good.

title: Very good performance from Phoenix
review: The movie tells the story of a court jester.It does refer to Wayne and tells that Joker was his other boy.With only one or two violent scenes you ' ll enjoy yourselves,if yu re lucky enough to get tickets.

title: Possibly DiCpario's and Schorsese's best
review: And that's what it is.About a small crook who tries to raise money from offshore company and becoms billionaire and ends up n the jail.It's long in duration but it's worth it.

movie_title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
title: Disney's masterpiece
review: Where to start?The immortal story,the musical moments,characters,voices a big triumph for Uncle Walt!

title: A Masterpiece
review: It's been 25 years since it came to the theaters,but still has the freshness,lovable characters,unforgettable music and animation handdrown.Don't miss it

title: Pixar's most underrated
review: When I first saw it,i deleted from my P.C.Now that I rewatch it I can feel the emotions,humor,music and what lovable character is WALL-E.Give it a chance,you won't be dissapointed.

title: Very good sequel
review: Not as good as the first one but still a very good effort with amazing underwater scenery.

title: That's cinema
review: I beleieve that movies from Europe and Asia are special.Take this one for example.Starts slowly and as the time goes the characters are developping we get to know the two famileis.The rich one and the poor one.The end of the film is strange.And the scene with the murder I didn't like.Overall a different film that will maybe capture your heart.Give it a chance.

title: Good
review: A new villain voiced by Steve Carell and the lvely funny minions.Good plot and family entertainment.

title: Call me Bruce
review: Jim Carrey and Tom Shadyac had done it again.Humor,a piece of romance and special effects make this one of the best comedies of the emperor Carrey.I m sure you'll have fun too.Highlight:The news scene with Evan Baxter.

title: Unnessecary
review: I loved the first one but this one wasn't necessary.Has its moments but the plot is quite boring.Watch it just once.

title: Classic epic
review: Heston was the one and only Moses and the one and only Ben Hur.3 hours of scenes changing one from the other,nice musci and the top scene chariot race at the end.Highly recommended!

title: Andy has grown up
review: But the main idea still succeeds the hit.New toys,new characters same success.

title: Two worlds
review: The world of Tarzan and the world of Jane.Killer soundtrack by Collins,veteran voice cast,wonderful drawing.

title: Fabulous film with a great musical score
review: Robin Williams as the genie steals the show.Wonderful animated characters fantastic music combine together and bring us Aladdin from 1001 nights.A MUST SEE!

title: Better than the first one
review: Helen is now the hero of the family.Focus on the woman character and the new adventure is full of upside downs.With the best scene being the racoon fight.Enjoy!

title: 3 hour masterpiece
review: Gibson fights for freedom and wins academy award for a fine film with magnificent fight scenes,intrigues and wonderful music from Williams.Sophie Marceau is the queen and Mc Cormak is the fiancee.Don't miss it.I ts difficult to find films like this anymore.

title: Colors of the wind
review: First saw it in the cinema 25 yeras ago and I liked it very much.Then I bought it on vidoecassette for my collection.Excellent handdrawing animation,academy award music and fabulous voice casting icluding Mel Gibson makes Pocahontas a true classic.P.S.Don't bother yourself with the sequel,it's a total waste.

title: Boring
review: Excellent voice cast but looks like a poor relative to Nemo
